metadata.Title: CVE-2019-18900 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low
metadata.Description: : Incorrect Default Permissions vulnerability in libzypp of SUSE CaaSPlatform 3.0, SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12, SUSE Linux Enterprise Server15 allowed local attackers to read a cookie store used by libzypp, exposingprivate cookies. This issue affects: SUSE CaaS Platform 3.0 libzyppversions prior to 16.21.2-27.68.1. SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 libzyppversions prior to 16.21.2-2.45.1. SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 1517.19.0-3.34.1.

criterions.comment: libzypp package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
